question:
If xy ≠ 0 and x ≠ –y,\(\frac{x^{36}-y^{36}}{(x^{18}+y^{18})(x^{9}+y^{9})}\)
(A) 1
(B) \(x^2 - y^2\)
(C) \(x^9 - y^9\)
(D) \(x^{18} - y^{18}\)
(E)\(\frac{1}{x^{9}-y^{9}}\)
